articles.title: Dua Lipa Wears Yellow Knit Bra and Mini Skirt Set in Argentina
articles.description: Dua Lipa took a break from her Future Nostalgia tour concerts to relax in Argentina, posting photos of herself in a knit yellow bra and mini skirt co-ord.
articles.content:
Fall may be creeping up on us (do you feel that autumn breeze?!) but Dua Lipa is still living her best summer life — and in Argentina, no less.

articles.title: Rugby-Boks ready for breakdown battle with Argentina
articles.description: South Africa captain Siya Kolisi is predicting a fierce battle at the breakdown in their must-win Rugby Championship clash against Argentina in Buenos Aires on Saturday, where victory for either side will keep them in the hunt for the title.

articles.title: Nottingham Forest signing receives late international recall
articles.description: Before swapping Atlético Madrid for Nottingham Forest this summer the 15-cap Brazil international had been out of the national team for almost a year following the Copa América final defeat to Argentina
articles.content:
Nottingham Forest loanee left-back Renan Lodi has received a recall to the Brazil national team for the first time in almost a year.
Since arriving at the City Ground late last month, the 24-year-old has started the Reds ' last two Premier League mat... [1421 chars]

articles.title: Manuel Turizo Scores First No. 1 on Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: Manuel Turizo banks his first No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart as “La Bachata” rises from No. 3 to lead the Sept. 10-dated ranking.
articles.content: Manuel Turizo banks his first No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart as “La Bachata” rises from No. 3 to lead the Sept. 10-dated ranking. The track trades places with Bizarrap and Quevedo’s “Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 52,” which dips 1-2 after... [1224 chars]

articles.title: Attempt to Kill Argentina’s Vice President Fuels Conspiracy Theories
articles.description: An assassination attempt against Argentina’s vice president, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, failed. Now many Argentines believe the entire event was a hoax.
articles.content:
In the case of the recent assassination attempt, that skepticism has been stoked by an early mistake in the police investigation and a torrent of misinformation on social media, some of it bolstered by prominent political operatives and pundits.
Ther... [1233 chars]

articles.title: Far-right group discussed killing Argentina’s vice-president, court hears
articles.description: Recording made just four days before Cristina Fernández de Kirchner survived assassination attempt
articles.content:
A series of audio recordings in which members of an extremist far-right group talked openly about killing the vice-president, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, have been presented in court by Argentina’s intelligence agency.
